overview: VET-MAN focuses on Tim Stewart, who has always aspired to be a vet, but after failing his degree certification, he seeks to establish himself as a mobile vet. After printing out his own diploma, he meets with naive third year veterinary student, Luke, as they seek out work in the ‘Vet Van’, but they soon realise that being a vet is more difficult than they anticipated.
tagline: Tim has always dreamed of becoming a vet, but after failing his degree, he resorts to illicit means to keep his dream alive.
title: VET-MAN
